doc.previous: The STS-118 mission, Endeavour's first since the refit, included astronaut Barbara Morgan, formerly assigned to the Teacher in Space project, but now a full member of the Astronaut Corps, as part of the crew. Morgan was the backup for Christa McAuliffe who was on the ill-fated mission STS-51-L in 1986.
doc.after: As it was constructed later, Endeavour was built with new hardware designed to improve and expand orbiter capabilities.
